title: LOL CRASHES AFTER CHAMP SELECT PLEASE HELP
body: after champ select it sent me a message that it had crashed. after restarting it, it attempted to repair it self but the repair does not seem to be progressing..any help would be appreciated

replies.body:
Does the repair error out or does it just seem to be taking awhile? If there are in fact missing or damaged files the repair needs to fully complete to correct that, so let that repair continue unless you see some type of error.

If it does in fact crap out and crash during the repair, I'd try using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a reinstall and clean uninstall.
